******
### COVID resources
******

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(DT)

agg <- read_csv(here("data/Aggregates.csv"))
```

```{r}
agg_html <- agg %>%
  mutate(Resource =  paste0("<a href='",Link,"'>",`Source name`,"</a>")) %>%
  mutate(Category = as.factor(`Website Category`),
         `Date added` = as.factor(`Date posted on Mathematica's website`)) %>%
  select(Resource, Category, Description = `Description of contents`, `Date added`)

DT::datatable(agg_html, filter = "top", escape = FALSE,
              options = list(
                autowidth = T,
                pageLength = 5, 
                lengthMenu = c(5, 10, 20))) %>%
  formatStyle(columns = c(3), fontSize = '80%')
```
